channel.title: Help please My server getting hacked
channel.description: EVERYTIME i turn my server on, within the first 5 seconds this happens... Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62024. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62025. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62026. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62027. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62028. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62029. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62030. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62031. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62144. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62145. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62146. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62147. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62148. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62149. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. Connection accepted from adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net: 62150. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. ....and it keeps going and going please help!

item.title: Help please My server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @i-h8-trance i-h8-trance
item.description:
@i-h8-trance wrote:

Send a mail to: abuse@bellsouth.net
He should be warned for not doing that again.
The second time he will be banned from its provider.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2008, 12:57:41 am[/size][hr]For Abuse Issues, email abuse@bellsouth.net. NO ATTACHMENTS. Include IP
address, time/date, message header, and attack logs.

thats it

Read full topic
item.source: Help please My server getting hacked

item.title: Help please My server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @EvolutionJB EvolutionJB
item.description:
@EvolutionJB wrote:

If i was you i would check your logs and find the crasher, btw it is a crasher whatever you did remember not to do it again, if you advertised on other servers it doesen’t help gain you respect.

so find the crasher using your logs and ip ban him and change his pass incase.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2008, 05:34:48 am[/size][hr]i h8 trace is right u have his ip so either make a command or use the command ::getip (Name) and try people untill u find the ip 74.227.246.243

Read full topic

item.title: Help please My server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“pies, post:4, topic:224180”]Paste the IP into the bannedips file, in which case the crasher won’t be able to log in anymore

In case you didn’t notice, the IP is: adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net
And bannedips should be in the file called ‘data’

Hope this helped :D[/quote]

Depends on if they’re using proxies.

Read full topic
item.source: Help please My server getting hacked

item.title: Help please My server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

Paste the IP into the bannedips file, in which case the crasher won’t be able to log in anymore

In case you didn’t notice, the IP is: adsl-227-246-243.mgm.bellsouth.net
And bannedips should be in the file called ‘data’

Hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: Help please My server getting hacked
